original_text: Because of that, this is how you can make me completely happy: In your mind, think about things in the same way as one another. Love one another completely. In your spirit, agree with one another. And work together for the same purpose.
korean_text: 마음을 같이하여 같은 사랑을 가지고 뜻을 합하며 한마음을 품어

sentences.original_text: this is how you can make me completely happy:
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 완전히 기쁘게 할 수 있는 방법은 이것입니다:

sentences.original_text: In your mind, think about things in the same way as one another.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 마음 속으로 서로 같은 생각을 하라.

sentences.original_text: In your spirit, agree with one another.
And work together for the same purpose.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 같은 목적을 위해 함께 일하라.
